Business Development Representative (Remote)

Position Overview

Leading provider of innovative business productivity software, aimed at helping companies streamline operations, improve efficiency, and drive growth, is seeking a highly motivated and dynamic Business Development Representative.

In this role, you will identify and engage with potential clients, demonstrating the value of the company’s software solutions.

Key Responsibilities

  • Conduct research to identify potential clients and key decision-makers within target companies
  • Engage with potential clients through multiple channels, including outbound calling, email outreach, social networking platforms, and inbound inquiries
  • Conduct comprehensive needs assessments to uncover prospects' challenges, objectives, and requirements
  • Deliver impactful product demonstrations, highlighting the unique advantages and features of the company’s business productivity software
  • Present personalized proposals and pricing strategies that align with the specific needs and budgets of clients
  • Maintain detailed records of activities, client communications, and pipeline status using CRM tools

Qualifications

  • Proven experience in business development, inside sales, B2B sales, lead generation, or a similar role
  • Exceptional communication and presentation skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with potential clients
  • Highly motivated, with the capacity to work both independently and collaboratively within a remote team environment
  • Effective time management and organizational skills
  • Proficiency with CRM software and other sales tools

Business Development Positions Offer

  • Competitive base salary plus performance-based bonuses
  • Comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision, 401(k), and paid time off
  • Continuous training and opportunities for professional growth and career advancement
  • A supportive, inclusive, and collaborative company culture
  • Flexible work-from-home options
